CustomField.formula: IF( IsVIP__c, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015O0000000NBLJ", "VIP", 16, 16), IF(IsPersonAccount, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015O0000000NBLF", "Consumer", 16, 16), IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Role_Type_Roll_Up__c)), Role_Type_Roll_Up__c =='Customer'), IF( Text(ServiceSLA__c) == 'Enterprise', IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015O0000000NBLH", "Enterprise", 16, 16), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015O0000000NBLI", "SMB", 16, 16)) , IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015O0000000NBLG", "ConsumerSMB", 16, 16)) ) )
CustomField.label: Service Type
